TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN ELECTRIC <AEP> UNIT TO REDEEM DEBT
TEXT.BODY: American Electric Power Co's Indiana and Michigan Electric Co said on June One it will redeem 64 mln dlrs principal amount of its 80 mln dlrs of 11-3/8 pct first mortgage bonds due 1990 at par. Reuter
